title: abc maker night
desc: Join us for... a night to celebrate  the artists who make our world abc home's favorite artists gathered together in the holiday spirit of making workshops & demos? with... Aviva Stanoff,  on the art of dyeing Jason Ross ,  on the art of leather craft? Beth Schaeffer from bluma project,  on the art of global relationships + jewelry making Jessica Green from A Little Weather,  on the art of weaving abc visual team,  on the art of flower arranging? Lucky Fish,  on the art of screenprinting Samantha Verrone,  on the art of recycling & rust-dyeing with vintage linens Betty Kay from In Pursuit of Magic,  on the art of creating magic? Kiva Motnyk,  on the art of ecclectic quilting? Susan Easton founder of From the Road,  on the art of off-the-grid traveling & global artisanship Coque Prieto,  on the art of knitting Geri  Roucaute,   on the art of jewelry making ? Counter Culture Coffee,  on the art of coffee Bittermilk,  on the art of the holiday cocktail? exclusive artisan gifts available for the holidays  ? + gifts with purchase from Red Flower? *all workshops & demos on the mezzanine of abc home
